title: Trump eyes privatizing U.S. Postal Service, citing financial losses
headline: Trump eyes privatizing U.S. Postal Service, citing financial losses
highlights: Trump feuded with the mail agency in his first term. Privatizing it could shake up consumer shipping and business supply chains.
author: By Jacob Bogage

image.caption: The U.S. Capitol on Jan. 6, 2021. (Michael Robinson Chavez/The Post)
